dict.acceptation: 在（某人或某事物的）前面；向前；预先；在将来，为未来；

sent.orig: Plan ahead. Find out the menu ahead of and make healthy choices, before you go.
sent.trans: 提前计划。在约定前找出菜单，点健康的菜。

sent.orig: We've got the go-ahead from the council/The council have given (us) the go-ahead to start building.
sent.trans: 我们已得到市政会的准许[市政会已准许我们]开工建。

sent.orig: We want to get ahead of competition, don't we? This new approach will get us ahead.
sent.trans: [咱们想要超过对手（赢过他们），对吧？那么这个全新方案就能让咱们成为赢家。

sent.orig: Ahead, go ahead. Follow the pace of life and proceed.
sent.trans: 月，“前进，永远前进，跟随永不停息的生活向前进。”

sent.orig: When the conditions exist, go ahead; when they don't exist, then create them and go ahead.
sent.trans: 有条件要上， 没有条件，创造条件也要上。
